title: Person
description: The Record Details in this Statement contain information about a natural person at a particular point in time.
technical note: The recordDetails object should be validated using the Person Record schema.

title: Entity
description: The Record Details in this Statement contain information that identifies and describes an entity at a particular point in time.
technical note: The recordDetails object should be validated using the Entity Record schema.

title: Relationship
description: The Record Details in this Statement describe the interests held by an interested party in a subject (an entity) at a particular point in time.
technical note: The recordDetails object should be validated using the Relationship Record schema.
